summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of 27th Avenue South from Yesler Way to Main Street in the City of Seattle, by grading & constructing concrete sidewalks under Ordinance No. 12911, creating Local Improvement District No. 1144 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
